message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This is an opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I recognize the value of the product, but I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider $750,000?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your budget constraints, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a revised price of $800,000 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while providing you with a competitive price.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. To be completely transparent, my budget ceiling is $775,000. If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal.
